subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=とう<たう, しょう<しやう
|kanon=とう<たう, しょう<しやう
|toon=たん
|on=よう<やう
|kun=ゆ-
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|ゆ|yomi=k}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=ゆ|-}}.  Used in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'', completed some time after 759 CE.<ref>{{RQ:Manyoshu|16|3824}}, text [http://jti.lib.virginia.edu/japanese/manyoshu/Man16Yo.html#3824 here]</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ゆ}}

# [[warm]] or [[hot]] [[water]]
# [[bathwater]]
# a [[hot spring]]
# a [[medicinal]] [[bath]]
# a [[medicinal]] [[decoction]]
# [[bilgewater]]
# [[molten]] [[metal]] used in [[casting]] or [[founding]]
# [[urine]]

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: Baby talk.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Possibly [[onomatopoeic]] of a person blowing on a hot beverage.
